message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $95.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. Would you be willing to come down to $85?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $90 for you, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny!
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $90 is still a bit above my budget.  I'm happy to pay $87, and that's my final offer.  Let me know what you think.

I can see you're really trying to get a good deal, Bob. I can meet you halfway between $87 and $90, so I'm willing to do $88.5 for you. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great price for this amazing product!
